name: Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 1.5 Dai-1-Wa: Kessei, Milky Holmes!
name_original: Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 1.5 Dai-1-Wa: Kessei, Milky Holmes!
description:
Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 1.5 Dai-1-Wa: Kessei, Milky Holmes! is an action game. It was originally released in 2010.
You can play Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 1.5 Dai-1-Wa: Kessei, Milky Holmes! on PSP.
